entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Monday 13 March 2023
